text: Nice little place. Great bar staff. Has a pool table, 2 dart boards and arcade golf games.

text: played a gig here. cool place and friendly staff

text: I really like this bar. Great place for fun!

name: Falandria Lee
text: Great People! Awesome Place!

name: Ted Gress
text: Great prices, great service, nice place without being too fancy!

name: tcfair86
text: The female bartenders are 5 stars. The male bartender is -5 stars. So everything cancels out and the only option left is 1 star.

name: Hug Savage
text: Had a good time !

name: Derek Hooper
text: The bouncer has a Napoleon complex and the bartenders were very unpleasant. Choose another bar.

name: Enrique Soto
text: Great to have a drink and more

name: Julie McCoy
text: Awesome place to chill.

name: Chris Riley
text: Good atmosphere!

name: Kristina Henley
text: Fantastic place!!!

name: Caitlin Thompson
text: Trash

name: Paula Coleman
text: "Professional Staff! Atmosphere is so inviting! Casual but very Upscale! Absolute Delicious! All the food is bursting with flavor! A must....visit there facilities for lunch, cost is very reasonable for the large portion sizes. Everything is so tasty! Love, Love Love the crab toast and the brussel sprouts!" The management staff(Nicki and Rosco) is very warm! Also, check there bar out...(great staff and fun). The drinks are the BOMB and REAL Italian wine!

name: Pete Welch
text: Great meal. Quick and attentive service. Really nice and warm feel to the decor. The oysters with granita were something unique I had not had before and would definitely have again. Buckwheat crepe with pork belly was interesting and delicious. The scallops dish was beautiful and excellent.

name: Art Hogarth
text: The staff are great and very friendly!  the food was flavorful and well presented.  i have not had a bad meal here.  Check them out and enjoy the food!

name: Steve and Deana Chapman
text: Excellent atmosphere. Casual, yet upscale. The crab toast is delicious and ample to share as a starter. The duck breast was tender and juicy. The watermelon granita with fennel cookie was the perfect ending to a great meal. Reasonably priced for exceptional food.

name: Brent Cary
text: Great menu with unique items.  I asked the server to bring me her favorite item and it was one of the best ribeye steaks I have had.  The flavors were phenomenal. Great place to eat in Birmingham.

name: Anthony Staggs
text: My wife and I came to Pizitz on a whim and... WOW, we were blown away! Fero is where it's at on every level; the atmosphere, the staff, the food and drinks were completely above what we expected. We definitely recommend to any and everyone, especially couples looking for a laid back upscale experience

name: Edward DeMellier
text: We thoroughly enjoyed our meal. We did have a couple of disappointments however. First, the oysters served with a horseradish granita was almost tasteless (they didn't charge us for the oysters after they asked how we liked them and we told the truth). After the meal was over we asked why we don't served bread, the answer was that they do if we had only asked. Otherwise our entrees were delicious and we will be back and be sure to ask for bread.

name: cam johnson
text: Ribeye was unbelievably good.  Lamb ravioli with ricotta rocked, our app was good too.  Service was good. Looking forward to returning.

name: Matthew Smith
text: Delicious... Had my birthday dinner here. Service was excellent and knowledgeable. Food was incredible (still dreaming of the Pork Osso Buco), cocktails were well done, and dessert was incredibly rich and chocolatey.

name: Ashley Teague
text: The food is outstanding and the only thing that could possibly be better than that is the incredible service. I love this place!

name: J C
text: Over salted and unimpressed.  I came in expecting something to challenge other Italian/Mediterranean restaurants in town, but came away unimpressed.  The bolognese was way over salted and nothing special, and the wine was overpriced and not unique.  I like Italian reds and the Caparzo Rosso is not unique or great.  I wanted to like this place, but I believe there are better options for similar prices.

name: Julie Sullivan
text: Stellar food in a modern setting. Pasta dishes are amazing. I loved the duck ragout and the braised lamb. My ribeye was cooked to perfection with gnocci and chantrell mushrooms. Staff is friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Greg Randall
text: Staff was knowledgeable & friendly, space was hip and had just the right level of noise, and the food was excellent -- well cooked/seasoned/considered.

name: Tena Diliberto
text: Delicious food and great service. We had a great meal!

name: Graham Hixon
text: Awesome adventurous Italian with fantastic staff. Never fails.

name: Todd Brownstein
text: I live in Bhm and a "foodie" friend was visiting from out of town on Sunday evening and looking for great meal to reconnect over! Unfortunately, theres a great gulf of fine dining on Sunday or Monday in the city. She was staying at the Elyton Hotel one block away (FABULOUS!) so we walked to the Patzits Food hall and THANKFULLY "Fero" keeps longer hours than the other stalls in the main hall. It was a fantastic experience from entrance to exit. The staff is welcoming and informed, and one of the owners "Charles" greeted us and watched over our two hour feast with (non-intrusive) zeal like a true restraunteur...both he and the food were delightful. The oysters with frozen granita were unexpected and divine, and her chicken with fall veggies and my scallops with an Egyptian spice sear were flawless! Even the coffee and and mascarpone beignets were exemplary. It was a grand meal in modernist restrained surroundings..exactly what we were seeking! !Bravo! "Fero" and welcome to Bhm! I'll be recommending your restaurant to everyone!

name: G. Everett Reeves
text: Amazing place with amazing food, staff, & service.

name: Timothy Gawne
text: Very good food and a nice atmosphere, but I'm not going back.  OK this seems minor, and I know that restaurants make a lot of money on wine, if I want a bargain on wine I'll go to Costco, but when you take a date to a nice restaurant, and the waitress goes over the top pushing the most expensive bottle, says only bad things about the other ones, so that if you take a more moderately priced bottle you look cheap, well, I won't say anything at the time but I won't go back.  And there was no chiller, so my very expensive Chardonnay ended up lukewarm.  And no bread.

name: Brandi Johnson
text: Great food and atmosphere

name: Cooper Crippen
text: Very good food but can get expensive quickly

name: Isabel Marques
text: Great wine and amazing food!

name: Chris Clark
text: Had a tasty brunch and Bloody Mary!

name: raymond akins
text: Good food laid back atmosphere...chill vibe

text: Very nice spot ...really enjoyed the service and bartender

name: Junell Lewis
text: Love to go get drinks there

text: Nice place with great atmosphere.

name: iamTHATGUY uknow
text: Very nice place to visit I highly recommend

name: Cherry Kilow
text: Good fruit 's!

name: Calvin Johnson
text: Great

name: Debbie Heckler
text: Albany Bistro is the favorite destination for our girls' day out lunches!   The staff is accommodating, efficient and friendly.    Great prices, too!    Today, our group had the snapper with rice and asparagus, the Bistro burger, and the meatloaf plate.  We were all raving that ours was the best choice!   (And we were all right!)

name: Kelli Lovelace
text: This is no longer Albany Bistro. A wonderful new breakfast café has opened. Whisked. They open very early and are open every day. The food is delicious and the options are varied... everything from a light breakfast to an over flowing omelet.

name: Julianne Hansen
text: I have visited this establishment many MANY times and have NEVER been disappointed in the service or the food!  It's a lovely place with an outstanding menu.  Compliments to the chef are given each and every time I experience Albany Bistro!

name: Sam Grey
text: Service is great and not overly attentive.  Fried oysters were outstanding, as was the beef tenderloin.  Love this place.

name: Celieboo
text:
Great menu. Intimate setting. Friendly staff. Lunch prices are more affordable than dinner, but the food is quality!
I went for lunch and enjoyed it so much tha I went back fo dinner.

name: Blake Singleton
text: I've eaten here twice. Both times the food has been excellent. If the prices were a little lower (not much, two people can comfortably eat here for less than $100), it'd be a 5 star rating.

name: Gail Blenis
text: Such a quaint little place. We loved the atmosphere and the food was delicious.  Try the fried chicken....so good!!!

name: Jeremy Bowling
text: Excellent lunch experience. I really enjoyed the food and thought it was reasonably priced. The Blueberry Cheesecake for dessert was perfection!

name: Brandon Patterson
text: Great service and the food is simply amazing. Thank you Albany Bistro for the great experience.

name: Kristin T
text: Love this place! Such yummy food and the people here are fantastic! It's our favorite restaurant!

name: Chris Latham
text: Hands down the best restaurant in the Tennessee Valley. Great service, amazing food, and lovely atmosphere.

name: Josh
text: This is a great spot to relax and enjoy a finely crafted sandwich from the many choices while enjoying a great view outside.

name: TJ Brakefield
text:
Chef Jacob knows great food. Located approx. .3 miles off the main strip it's a very interesting environment paired with wonderfully prepared and plated dishes. I highly recommend the beef stroganoff, provided it does not rotate off the menu.
P.s. don't rotate the beef stroganoff.

name: Carolyn Binger
text: Absolutely delicious! Best meatloaf I have ever had

name: Keith Morgan
text: Food was excellent. We will be back. Make a reservation they are busy.

name: Lindsey Faulkner
text: Exquisite food, atmosphere,  and service!

name: Christina Simmons
text: My friend and I decided to try this restaurant out for lunch one day.  When we arrived the lady taking our order told us they were out of basically half the menu and the menu is not very big to begin with.  I ordered a chicken salad sandwich and mashed potatoes, they were extremely plain tasting, not enough seasoning...But edible.  My friend ordered a salad which she paid $8.99 for, and all she got was a small bowl of lettuce, a little bit of chicken, some crutons, and some dressing.  I felt really bad for her, because when she was finished she was still very hungry, but didn't have time to go anywhere else and get anything before going back to work.  Maybe this place needs to call Chef Ramsey from Kitchen Nightmares to help them out, haha.

resp.text: Christina we would definately like to have the chance to prove that our food is above ordinary.  Because we are an independent, chef-owned business, we take great pride in bringing the freshest, highest quality products to the table.  There are times that we choose to let our inventory run low...usually before holidays or times when we know we will be closed for an extended period of time. It's not that we are ill-prepared, instead we try to bring only the best to the table.  We sincerely apologize for the "nightmare" you & your guests experienced here.  We hope you will give us a chance to show you a truly great lunch.

name: Shenon Williams
text: I wish i could give this place zero stars!!!!  My cousin rented out the place for his wedding reception they bragged on how this is their favorite place. They must not have recieved such harsh service as i did. There was a server assigned to our table she was a delight. But for some reason another very rude disrespectful server kept approaching me. I felt as if i was in high school and she was a bully. She was very aggressive towards me for no reason and kept coming to our table to address me as uf she wanted to start a arguement. She damn near snatched my glass of water away from me and continued to harrass me throughout the night. Now it was obvious to everyone at the table she was a bully. The crazy thing about this whole situation is that SHE WASNT EVEN MY SERVER!!!!  there was no reason for her to come to our table in the first place and the fact she continued to come back and harass me was. Crazy.   When i told the manager about this server he chumped me off as if i was just complaining to complain. I am a bartender so i know all about customer service. And This place is the worst. I hope they stay closed so no one else has to endure what i went through. I am soooooooo pissed. I wish thetevwas more i could do to keep this place closed. I have never been so disrespected in my life.

name: Christian Smith
text: Great atmosphere, and even better food. A Decatur favorite.

text: Awesome place. A hidden gem of Decatur

text: Excellent! To start, the building itself is amazing. The fact that it is also filled with great wine, amazing food, and talented people, takes it to the next level! I am so happy this is in Birmingham!!!

name: Alexandra Battito
text: Gorgeous timeless decor and friendly knowledgeable staff! Fantastic selection of wines by the glass, delicious small plates, and large retail bottle selection. Surprised by their reasonable prices as well. So happy for this addition to 2nd Ave N!

name: Christina Coleman
text: We love this place. Servers are professional and helpful. We enjoyed sitting outside and talking with people as they walked by. Definitely going back.

name: Anita Gann
text: Beautiful interior and ambiance. Sleek and clean, yet warm and welcoming. Simple menu with fresh, seasonal, local products. Staff is knowledgeable, friendly and helpful. Outstanding wine list. Gray and Ashley have provided an elegant place to relax with friends.

name: Fleming Bails
text: Great selection, super knowledgeable staff. Do not pass on the pickled veg with your charcuterie board, 10/10!!

name: John Bowles
text: Great selection of wonderful wines, delicious charcuterie. Excellent service. Fine balance between bar and table service. (And, they also do retail wine sales.)

resp.text: Thank you so much and we look forward to seeing you again!

name: Roger Carlisle
text:
Wonderful food, ambiance, and wine.
The tarting, salmon and beef cheek sliders
are delicious. The wine is excellent and
fairly priced.  We love the atmosphere.

name: VSW
text: Amazing wine bar. Great ambiance and small plates.

name: jonathan raney
text: Love. Delicious food, excellent pairings. Also great to-go board options. Knowledgeable, friendly staff.

name: Patrick Helmick
text: been wanting to go to Avine since they opened and got there yesterday- what a GREAT addition to the birmingham food /drink family ! First of all the place is beautiful-! The next thing we noticed was the enthusiasm of the staff- but that is  backed up by outstanding knowledge of the wine and food offerings. We put ourselves in their able hands and we were rewarded with delicious wines and small plates to compliment the wine. Overall a great experience ! Go you will be rewarded - we will be back soon and often !

name: Jorge Rodriguez H
text: Best service I had in Birmingham, highly recommend for chill hangout for wine and snacks.

resp.text: Thank you Jorge! Hope you have a chance to visit us again soon. Cheers!

text: Posh atmosphere (upbeat / not too stuffy), attentive / friendly service, great wine selection AND cocktails (if you are not a wino). And I love that you can buy bottles to go!

text: Cool wine bar with small bites downtown. Not a huge wine selection by the glass but always changing and always a good selection. Open any bottle is the shop for a corkage fee.

text: Lester and Tammy yall are simply the best !!!  I heard about bootleggers by passing by one day when I was driving didn't even know about bootleggers decided to come see what I thought. I'd try it out.i was a regular at another bar. After 1st time there bootleggers was only bar I wanted to ever go to .I get to see if my leg stays or goes tomorrow . And don't think I'd be able to be anything but a one legged  pirate with a broomstick on the right side after that. Promise I'll send 100 to take the place of one when I tell everyone I see about yall . Thanks for the smiles , laughs , and songs !!!!!

The company you get there are older and are pretty much only a tight knit group of regulars. It's really the only way that place is still a thing. text: One of Mobile's oldest watering holes..

name: Thatbrownguymike
text: I enjoyed looking at all different breeds of game fowl. Didnt know that they could be so cool looking. When my time comes to pick the right fowl. Im going to see the Chicken Man. Thanks for the awesome tour of the place. Enjoyed to hospatality as well.

name: Larry Barlow
text: My Family and I own the longhollow Gamefowl farm of Alabama.

name: Colombian Flag
text: Great place

name: Charles McCall (Charlie)
text: Great and friendly service. Comfortable atmosphere. And a really nice bathroom lol.

name: Jan Byars
text: Love this place! Cold beer. Great proprietor! Small but always fun.

name: Amanda H
text: Comfortable quiet atmosphere, good music, good prices, nice looking place!

name: James Johnson
text: Nice friendly place no smokeing alloud

name: Toni Bush
text: One of my favorite places to go when we just want to relax and enjoy a good drink.  The people are awesome and the drinks are the best.  No one else makes a better Grey Goose martini!

name: Rich The King
text: Nice spot. Plenty of room.

name: Joseph Armstrong
text: Jeff the owner is racist and very judgmental .. DO Not go here unless you are a wealthy older white man. Otherwise the owner Jeff will judge you and show his true colors. Great place for kkk meeting.

name: Blake Pool
text: a great place to sit back and relax and enjoy a drink with friends. Bullets has one of the best outdoor seating areas in town. If you are hungry you can order food from the adjacent establishment.

name: Leviticus Pants
text: Better than KTs

name: Blind N Deaf
text: Semi dive bar with a great feel. I love the decor, and the bartenders are always fun

name: Jo Smyth
text: Quiet little bar with single billiards table, outside seating area, no riff raff.  No smoking inside. Nice atmosphere and plenty of TV's.

name: Eric Chapman
text: Jeff is a good dude with a nice bar. Go check out his place.

name: Lamar Hadden
text: Great place to relax. Never know who u might c. Jeff is the best.

name: Jacqueline Murphy
text: Mr Jeff have great customer service

name: David Mott

text: Great relaxed and cozy atmosphere with a super friendly owner! Starting to serve appetizers and snacks!

name: Shawn Brown
text: Cozy & quite. Good music.

name: Manuel Keener
text: Perfect bar.  Russell is always on point!

name: Bello Desiderare
text: The bar is too small and the owner was extremely drunk and rude. I was shocked and embarrassed for my friends. I will not be taking anyone to this establishment again. I can see why there was only a handful of patrons here.

name: Gina Baxley
text: Bartender is friendly. Great atmosphere!!

name: Jeff Byars
text: BULLETS is CLOSED!!!

text: Great place to party! Great sound system and entertainment!

name: Melissa Greeson (SHUNSHINE)
text: I simply adore the Bartender  ;)

text: This place is awesome diverse crowd, awesome bartender, great live shows and partys nice pool tables and hey its in the woods. And its not surrounded by stormtroopers that follow you

text: First time going..had a blast... friends definitely made..I will go back

name: Lisa Bowman
text: Better than Harry and billys.   Lol

name: Sandy Miller
text: Great staff, great entertainment. Fun every time.

name: Shannon Worley
text: Just a place to waste time ....not really a nice place..just same people so not much trouble...

name: William “Chip” Herbinger
text: Still my favorite neighborhood kareoke spot.. never a dull moment with Darlene and Cotton

name: April Carr
text: Fun

name: Gary Patrick
text: Cold beer and real nice people that drank there had a lot of great convos. A pick of Bobby Allison on the wall that I really liked. Thanks MS Stacy for taking us out there

name: pamela sanford
text: Had fun drank a little sang karaoke, saw a few old friends.  Remember to tip your waitress "Darlene" and get "cotton" to serve up your favorite song on karaoke. And let's not forget "Billy" for just being awesome.

name: William Herbinger
text: A local hangout...a place where the neighborhood comes to have fun

name: Ginger Minor
text: I luv the bar tenders there , just an easy going crowd.....

name: Karen Greer
text: Great place for friends and family

name: Ronald Brown
text: Well when I drink that was a place I go and drink now I don't drink no more so I go to karaoke and play pool with friends

name: Ryker Briggs
text: I celebrated my PhD earlier this evening in this delicious restaurant. Well we passed a fine evening and the place was unquestionably the reason for the successful celebration. The team  participated in a gorgeous style, the food was delicious and my friends were extremely  glad. We shall surely visit again for more celebrations. thanks very much.

name: Netty Cantrelle
text: Fun place

name: Kelly Johansen
text: Its great on Friday and Saturday suck a relaxed atmosphere. We love Darlene best bartender ever!!

name: Tim Frederick
text: Pretty good hang out probably the best place in Bessemer with kaoroke Thursday-Sunday night ;good beer and cocktails and friendly service.Again Bessemer is not a nightlife town but I would recommend this place over most others in town.

name: Kirt Koon
text: Dive bar with karaoke. Fun times.

name: Kenny Carter
text: It was great with friends

name: Lauren Tucker
text: Down to earth, real people and some good ol' country fun!!

name: Henry Mack

name: Dean Franklin
text: Bunch of good ole boys here,Danny is a stand up all around great guy.

name: Terry Arwood
text: Excellent

name: Stacey Watson
text: You can't beat a good old dive. This place has changed so much in the last few years!! No riff raff no fights just good old people having themselves a good time. It's off the beaten path but they make everyone feel welcome and have a good variety of your favorite cocktails.

name: Michael Swinson
text: Love it...first time here and they make you feel like you'd been coming here your whole life

name: Melinda McWaters
text: Really enjoy this place, I have alot of great memories from here with (Flooky),....but who didn’t ? ✌️🌹

name: Doug Jolley
text: Miss Darlene and Miss Lynn are the best !!!

name: TRAY C
text: A really nice place to hang out and have a good time!!! A private club, they have good karaoke, great drinks and awesome people!

text: Bartender was very personable...  We had a good time there...  They have a pool table

text: I'm From Eufaula. A great place to go to when I'm down

text: Loud music. Lotta fun.  Smoking allowed. Friendly staff. Private club.

name: Eric “EL Duderino” Mitchell
text: Mike the bartender is the best and always on point

name: Stephen Estes
text: Usually a quiet, working class bar, very friendly.

name: Deb S
text: Great people, good food, good prices for drinks, and lots of fun.

name: Jefferson Foster
text: Good people!!

name: Monique Trent
text: Fun atmosphere, full bar, 2 7" bar box pool tables for billiards players, occasional karaoke, juke box, attentive and accommodating bar tender, extremely reasonably priced drinks, no closing time due to club membership regulations. No fee for club membership! Adequate parking and sufficient seating. This is a jeans and boots type of bar, comparable to a biker bar, although Hilltop Lounge is not themed as such.

name: Elizebeth Dillard
text: I have not been to the lounge itself. They have a hotel/ apartments behind the lounge. My son's family live there and everyone is like family.  They also have motorhome hook-ups. They rent by the day or week. Will work nicely for visitors. Not fancy. But will do for those who are trying to save money while traveling.

name: Cindy Dunn
text: Billy benefield has really clean the place up! Used to have a very bad reputation, but now it's a very friendly place!! Patio in back! KARAOKE on Fridays  & Saturday. Very respectable now!

name: Angela Hall
text: I'm not sure how to write the hilltop because it wasn't me that was there it's in my Google Maps history because my phone has been hacked for over a year so you would have to maybe ask Michael chavers you know Luke or his b**** Lori Sutton how the hilltop was

name: Rode King
text: Good vibes everytime I go💯

name: Kimbla Ellis
text: The music was GREAT!!

name: Jim brown
text: Awesome great people and the best food around

name: Hugh Charles Ellington Jr.
text: Good old fashion fun...whether you like old classic or new school hip hop and rb Frank's Place is the spot...better chicken wings then zaxby

name: Katina Binion
text: It's a grown folks spot, play blues, clean, cook, b no fighting come on out

name: Bill Scott
text: U got to go ther if u in the Area!!!!!!!

name: Ella R. Brown
text: Great place for a party

name: willie chambliss
text: Everything is very good

name: Jason Fritz
text: Best Bar in Bama

name: James White
text: Super friendly staff, fantastic cocktails. You really couldn't ask for a better place for a small get together or a full function.

name: Ben Gitter
text:
I don't drink.

But when I do, it's only at sessions.

But truly, best spot in Tuscaloosa.

Upscale, accommodating, old "speakeasy" atmosphere that feel straight out of the prohibition.

(Order a "Mexican firing squad")

name: Anna Ruth
text: Have been a couple time for friends birthdays! Had such a great experience. Also want to mention had an older man come up to my group of friends and the owner, Hunter, immediately took care of the situation before it got to a point that made us super uncomfortable. The atmosphere is great. Super friendly staff. Plus the music is great. Would definitely recommend.

name: Wil Bowman
text: Atmosphere is unique and laid back, with a interesting cocktail menu. Staff is friendly and knowledgeable. Prices were reasonable.  Crowd definitely trended young on my visit. They also have a nice outdoor seating area. Like most places downtown, be prepared to park a block, or two, away.

name: Mark M
text: A great spot in Tuscaloosa.  Has that old speak easy vibe.  The drink prices are reasonable but the drink quality is exceptional.   Best bar to "drink" at in town.  Small place so get there early.

name: Kira Buckley
text: Very glad I found this little place. Drinks were excellent and service was awesome. I’ll definitely try to make it back before I leave town.

name: Gary Sarrat
text: Hunter at Session Cocktails has established a fantastic spot in the middle of The Strip in Tuscaloosa that focuses on quality drinks, service, and overall experience. If you are looking fir a more adult place to enjoy a finely crafted cocktail away from the usual college bar, this is your place. Hunter’s intense focus on service is absolutely the best.

name: Keeva Hartzell
text: Visiting from Kansas City! Came here to meet up with longtime childhood friends of my boyfriends over the holidays. Excellent service, drinks and vibe. We could use a bar like this in KC. Loved every drink and the soft seating areas. (Small things like mints, pony tails and tampons in the ladies bathroom are an amazing touch! Keep it up)

name: Sydney Ott
text: Fun time at new cocktail bar! I’ve been waiting for Tuscaloosa to open a cool bar, and Hunter did a great job! Staff was awesome too. Definitely going to be visiting again soon 🍸

name: Ed Rascati
text: Really nice. Andrew is excellent bartender!

name: Eric Wilson
text:
Hunter and his staff do an amazing job running a true top-notch craft cocktail bar.  Very upscale setting and catered to the more mature crowd.
Great place to unwind, chat with friends and enjoy an excellent cocktail.  Greta job Hunter - proud of your success and THANK YOU for bringing a truly unique experience to Tuscaloosa.

name: Joseph Scott
text: Funky cool atmosphere,  the bartenders were Great!! The old fashion was fantastic and they do a drink called Serenity Now that was AMAZING!! We will be back!!

name: Lynn White
text: First-time visit last night.  Cool spot!  Lots of younger folks, but they welcomed the 'seasoned' customers.  Check it out!

name: M S
text: Rude bouncer just let other people through ahead of people already waiting in line.  Will never attempt to go here again.

name: Victoria Douglas
text: best drinks in ttown! loved the staff!

name: Emily Patton
text: Fabulous bar with fabulous service!!! Love Hunter and his wonderful staff. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: john vick
text: The best bar in tuscaloosa if your looking for quality cocktails and good people!

name: Megan Taylor Broadbent
text: Service is AMAZING. Talked to the owner and he is phenomenal and so so kind. Talked us through the menu but it also sat and told us if there is anything we needed or if we didn’t like our drink he would make us a new one. Vibe is cool, service is better. Prime place.

name: Lori Shassberger
text: This bar is amazing. The owner, Hunter, is the nicest man. He makes sure he gets a chance to talk to everyone he can. I just asked for something fruity and I was made the best drink I’ve ever had, a chestnut club. It is a great place to enjoy a delicious drink.

name: Sydney Ott
text: Fun time at new cocktail bar! I’ve been waiting for Tuscaloosa to open a cool bar, and Hunter did a great job! Staff was awesome too. Definitely going to be visiting again soon 🍸

name: Lacie Williams
text:
Best bar in Tuscaloosa, hands down.  Wonderful experience, great bartenders, fabulous vibe all the way around.

The interior space is a really beautiful, upscale barroom, with plenty of space around the bar, several cozy booths, and a couple of lounge areas in the back. Outside, there's an awesome completely covered patio (the only one like it in town!). The owner and each of the bartenders are all so knowledgeable and caring about creating the best cocktails, and are quick to recommend something for your taste. Their happy hour specials are the best too. The music is always great, the bathrooms are always clean, and the crowd is always friendly.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND, perfect spot for date night, grabbing a drink before and/or after dinner, or just hanging out.  Love it.

name: Drew Henson
text: Best bartenders in town!:)

name: Nicole Burkhalter
text: Great atmosphere, top notch drinks. The best part is that the owner is always present greeting customers making sure everyone is taken care of. Love the vibe!

name: Caitlin Reilly
text: Session Bar is a unique and wonderful addition to Downtown Tuscaloosa.  Hunter is an incredible owner with great taste in cocktails and a carefully crafted menu.  The ambiance is incredible, with great attention to detail in the design and decoration of the space.  If cocktails aren't really your style there are also plenty of local beers to choose from and a selection of great wines as well!  I've known Hunter for a long time and I am so happy to see this bar finally come together.  I can't wait to go back!

name: Zoe Marie
text: This is such a great bar. Beautiful decoration and such a welcoming atmosphere. The owner, Hunter, is often there and very attentive to patrons. All of the bartenders are also very attentive and have great suggestions from the menu. I was recommended the Piña Colada, which was delicious and not too sweet as it often is, and another gin-based drink that I really enjoyed. I frequent this place and highly recommend it!

name: Melody Kernan
text: We have had a great experience every time we've been here. Hunter has always made it a point to greet us and make sure we are taken care of! All of the bartenders are incredible and the drinks are so smooth. The atmosphere is impeccable. There are heaters and seating out on the patio if you enjoy a smoke during your drink. The perfect date spot and it doesn't feel like it's in a college town at all. Thank you!!

name: Cam Alexander
text: This cocktail bar reminds me of home in all the best ways. I was impressed to see Tuscaloosa have a true cocktail bar that has an elegant vibe in the building and can be enjoyed with friends or a loved one. Great drinks, great atmosphere.

name: Russell Ferson
text: Great atmosphere, great traditional cocktails, and fantastic bartenders! You can tell each bartender truly cares about the drinks they make. Don’t hesitate to ask your bartender questions if you’re unsure what to get. They are more than willing to steer you in the right direction and help you find a drink you like.

name: Paige Loux
text: LOVE. Staff is awesome, especially Cassie! Great drinks and fun atmosphere 10/10 played 80s music and everything

name: rl caj (rl)
text: Expensive, but really really nice inside and outside with awesome freaking drinks.

name: Tyler Bailey
text: Love this place!  Best cocktails in town by far.  All of the bartenders are consistent and know their stuff.  The owner has done a great job getting the vibe right and giving Tuscaloosa something it’s been missing.  Hunter is the man.

name: Seth Richardson
text: Absolutely fantastic service and atmosphere. Whether you’re in town for a visit or a local, Session is without the question the go-to place for cocktails. Hunter and his staff are professional, knowledgeable, and friendly. The menu changes regularly and includes both staples and seasonal favorites. I recommend the Old Fashioned to anyone who cares to listen, but that French 75 is growing on me.

name: Adam Jacobs
text: Best new bar in Tuscaloosa! It’s a one of a kind local cocktail spot with multiple excellent hand-crafted cocktail options. The management and staff are obviously experienced and can tailor any drink to your personal taste. Close-knit intimate atmosphere that allows you the opportunity to sit down and enjoy a drink with friends.

name: Christopher Hydrick
text: This place is fantastic! Tuscaloosa was really missing a place like this. The drinks are well-mixed and taste great. The menu has really good variety, as well. For the quality, the drinks are also well-priced. Can't wait for an opportunity to go back!

name: Luke Kiszla
text: Great concept bar that has found its niche in Tuscaloosa. Nice ambiance, well-curated drink menu with high-quality concoctions that you couldn't find anywhere else in town, and at few other places in the entire state. Prices are fair, especially for the quality of drinks. My personal favorite part of the bar is how they chose to set the building back off the street during renovation, allowing for comfortable all-seasons seating out in front of the bar.

name: Melissa Ann Milano
text:
As of my first time here, I do not have one complaint. I enjoyed having a cocktail that was actually made well, yet different than what I would normally order at a bar.

We had no expectations going, but I must admit I was a bit intrigued by the reviews. Most are great reviews, but the few that were bad, stuck out. So again, intrigued. Luckily for my husband, I was intrigued so much, we went out on Saturday night. Or maybe it's my love for whiskey? 🤷‍♀️

I ended up enjoying three cocktails of a drink I never had before. Why? Was the drink really that good? Or was it the music? Because the music was pretty spot on for me.

So good drinks, good music.

The atmosphere has a bit darker ambiance with marble booths and velvet backing. There is a small open space in the back for larger groups. Or maybe just great minglers.

The staff was friendly during our drinking hours.

So good drinks, good music, good staff and finally!!!

name: Alexander
text: Session is a very clean and upscale establishment. The menu is filled with excellent cocktails of great quality and detailed preparation. I look forward to every drinks unique presentation at Session, and will be back again soon.

name: Sean Feely
text: The premiere cocktail lounge in Tuscaloosa hands down.  Fresh hand squeezed juices for all drinks.  GREAT wine prices. Staff is beyond friendly. If you are in Town to visit or a local you will not be disappointed with the atmosphere or service.  Nice change from a sports bar for sure.  Great location for before or after dinner drinks.

name: chase w
text: A smoke free establishment that provides a clean and comfortable bar space to enjoy a drink. There a number of perks, the patio area is recessed from the street offering some privacy, it is smoke free, the main bar is a beautiful white stone and the woodwork inside is aesthetically pleasing.  The staff is made up of a group of very knowledgeable and high character individuals, all trained by a local bartender turned owner who has a passion for service and entertainment.  Conveniently located a short walk from a number of restaurants(five, depalmas, half shell, chucks), a great place to start or finish your evening.

name: Sean Feely
text: The premiere cocktail lounge in Tuscaloosa hands down.  Fresh hand squeezed juices for all drinks.  GREAT wine prices. Staff is beyond friendly. If you are in Town to visit or a local you will not be disappointed with the atmosphere or service.  Nice change from a sports bar for sure.  Great location for before or after dinner drinks.

name: Logan Tavel
text: Exactly what Tuscaloosa has been looking for. Very clean with high quality drinks and polite staff. Sharp atmosphere that gives off great vibes and an enjoyable experience!

name: Allison Smith
text: Session Bar is the perfect addition to the Tuscaloosa Nightlife scene. We were desperately in need of an establishment that offers quality cocktails and a hip stylish atmosphere. I highly recommend stopping in for a classic Old Fashioned or my favorite, the Mai Tai.

name: Dennis Calvert
text: Great cocktails!

name: Adrienne Adams
text:
Great bar, nice decor, Happy Hour drinks were on point. Definitely a great spot to meet friends and unwind after work. Hunter is super nice and makes a great Cuba Libre 😉🥃 - loved the drink presentation.
Wish I had taken photos.....well next time!

name: John Jorgensen
text: Nothing but good experiences and a warm welcome from the staff and owner every time I visit. Drinks are fantastic and updated on a rather regular basis compared to other bars in the area. Highly recommend a visit if you are in ttown.

name: Brad Lake
text: Good people, great drinks, and conveniently located. What else can you ask for?? The staff knows their stuff and the cocktails are on point! They also have beer!

name: Haley Sharp
text: Session is the best new addition to the downtown Tuscaloosa bar scene, very unique atmosphere with a big city bar feel; yet comfortable and non pretentious. Hunter’s passion for craft cocktails and supreme service shines through and will not disappoint. Check out Session whether you’re going out for happy hour in a T-shirt or dressed to the nines for pre/post dinner drinks.

name: Grey Standridge
text: Best place in town to grab a cocktail! Casual Upscale environment and friendly knowledgeable staff. My fiancé and I dropped in before dinner on a recent visit to town and had such a great time we almost missed dinner, go check out this new gem in Ttown!

name: Cade Warner
text: Great drinks, concept and staff in a friendly atmosphere. Perfect for social and business outings. Hunter has done a great job with the place.

name: William Mountain
text: This is just the spot that Tuscaloosa needed. Relaxed atmosphere with a staff that knows how to make proper drinks. Awesome happy hour specials, too.

name: Cameron Oswalt
text: Very classy place. Great place to talk with friends and enjoy all of the great cocktails they have to offer.

name: Dakota Harris
text:
Hunter Wiggins and his staff are equivalent to chic-fil-a quality customer service.

Best bar in Tuscaloosa HANDS DOWN. Best old fashioned I’ve ever had. If you’re in ttown. Do yourself a favor and come here. I would give 6 stars if possible.

name: John Stabler
text: A little on the expensive side but high quality liquor, polite staff and prompt service make for a great experience. Been a few times and every visit is consistent and enjoyable.

name: Traci Hostetler
text: We visited on Feb 15, 2020. The bar is beautifully appointed and the drinks were very good. We called our daughter and her friends, UA alum, to join us. They decided to use the restroom before ordering and were accosted by one of the workers (a manager?). He yelled at them for their audacity to use his facility without ordering, then aggressively pursued them as they headed for the door. My husband and I were sitting outside and witnessed his pursuit of them as he aggressively threw open the door, and quickly apologized to my husband and I as he realized they were with us. I am appalled by his behavior. I could understand a conversation with them about the facilities being for customers only, but pursuing three 23 year old women like a predator is absolutely uncalled for and I will NEVER return nor recommend this place to anyone as a result.

name: Kellen Mataafa
text: You’ll find bartenders who genuinely care about their craft and drinks that prove it. The owner, Hunter, is one of the best craft cocktail mixologist in all of the south and you’d be a fool not to stop in and experience what he and his crew create.

name: Jill Woods
text: Best spot in Tuscaloosa! Great drinks, wonderful atmosphere & all around good time!

name: Stacie Tucker
text:
From unique vintage cocktails to modern twist mixes to colorful wines and select beer- SESSION BAR is the place to go. Young or old, there’s no dress code.... #gohaveasession with
Hunter and his staff.  They are stellar ❤️
#oldfashioned #downtownttown

name: Michael Holmes
text: Jordan and Co were awesome. Good drinks, great atmosphere.

name: Michael Holmes
text: Jordan and Co were awesome. Good drinks, great atmosphere.

name: Chandler Duncan
text: Great atmosphere and drinks. Friendly, attentive staff

name: Ashlee H
text: Absolutely the best bar in Tuscaloosa, the drink menu is amazing, the staff is full of skilled bartenders that come up with incredible drinks, and the bar itself is an experience. This is my new go to spot.

name: Lisa Fortenbery
text: Beautiful venue, unique and delicious cocktails, accompanied by a fantastic atmosphere.  Nothing else like it in Tuscaloosa

name: Josh Taylor
text: Great atmosphere, glad to have a new bar in town!!

name: Austin Anderson
text: Great drinks. Best cocktails in town

name: Mike W
text: Went for the first time. Great place to get a real drink made well at a good price.

name: James Barber
text: Great hideaway place with a great atmo6.

name: Chase Barnes
text: Great drinks. Great staff.

name: Dale Jackson
text: Cool, Cocktails, in a laid back vibe.

name: Corey Harris
text: Good atmosphere, great drinks

name: Preston Sharpe
text: Fantastic service and great cocktails!

name: DG Beta Psi Photo Storage
text: Owner was so rude. Also they charged me $5 more than my friends that got the same drink

name: Carter Helm
text: I came to Session with a group of my friends. Because I wasn’t the “target market” of this bar, the owner openly mocked me and my friends to other customers and then cussed me out when I was leaving. My friends and I all paid for our drinks and tipped well, so I was shocked that I was treated this way by the owner.

name: Jay Tavares
text: Emily and Sammie are the best!

name: Laura Catherine Vaughn
text: Drinks were average, service was poor, and owner yelled at and demeaned customers
